title: r u fking kidding me riot?
body: 17 minutes into a game and a bug splat came. Couldn't reconnect and after i finally reconnect we already lost. I get 5 low priority queue?? Was not even my fault? What the fuck

replies.body: in my opinion bug splat should be better at looking into error logs, Like I get what you mean man it sucks, Updates, Internet, Physical Computer faults they all happen randomly and you get punished. They should have a more sophisticated log.

I mean it happens like you don't have control if Telstra crashes or your Windows decides to say "_hey I know youre busy but F*** you were doing an update.. we say it will only be a few minitues but were lying.. you're 16GB Ram wont help either_"
Yeah it's annoying. Like bugsplat decided to show up and it ain't my fault. Then I get a low prior queue lmao

It's now becoming a cliche term. But...

RIP

A string of badluck.

Last week, my hard drive decided to die so I quit a game i was on at that time to get my hard drive fixed. Got Low priority queue and that was fully my fault. Played my final game as a low prior queue and bugsplat comes and gets me another low prior.......
